metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Weeping Willow has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Chord Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Weeping Willow has sections analyzed in the following keys: D♯ Minor,  and F♯ Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
